description: The serviceberry, or Amelanchier arborea, is an amazing plant species due to its versatility, beauty, and fragrant blooms. It grows in many different climates and soil types, adapting easily to its environment. Its arching branches bear fragrant white springtime blooms, edible fruit with a sweet flavor, yellow-orange autumn leaves, and silvery bark. This deciduous shrub or small tree can fit into nearly any landscape, making it an excellent choice for both ornamental purposes or edible landscaping. No wonder it is often referred to as the "all-in-one" plant!
